title: varugalAmO ayyA
sahitya:
varugalAmO ayyA oru varam pera nAn maruda malai mEl uraiyum murugA unnarugE


anupallavi

  perugum bhaktiyuDanE pEdaiyEnuDaiya manam urugik-karaiya unnai sharaNam aDaiyavE


caraNam    sIrum sirappu mighum ArumukhA enavum vEru nigarillAda pErazhagA enavum 
sUra samhAra vIrat-tilakA enavum kUrip-pOTriyun pEraruT-pETraikkOri
